TEXT.S: Arthur Agee sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, wal malaxmisuq qaniy la. kawas tay 1972, ryax sa tay 22 nqu tay 10, Arthur Agee, biru na Bunge'. trang mrkyas Agee ga maki beh Chicago area near qasa. pqwasan biru 1987 kawas na huqan abaw,t'aring mqwas hopa pqwasan biru qyanux nya. pinqbaqan nya Arthur Agee mqwas biru sa Marshall Metro pqwsan biru seneng. Arthur Agee mqwas biru sa Arkansas State pqwsan biru krahu.
